dialogStrings:
{Cloud}
“I don't know who you are, but…”

“…Hey sis,
this one's a little weird.”

{Aeris}
“Don't fight here!
You'll ruin the flowers!”

Reno
“Did you see
that guy's eyes?”

Reno
“Hmm.
All right, c'mon, get to work.”

“Um, we're, um
taking care of the um,
flowers for the um, lady here.”

“…is that OK?”
{CHOICE}I don't mind
{CHOICE}No it's not!

{Cloud}
“That's too much to ask of kids.”

“Too much to ask? What?
I don't get it.”

{Aeris}
“Will you take good care of my flowers, for me?”
